data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Gorenjska who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gorenjska, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Gorenjska to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 480 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Gorenjska, Slovenia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 206,270 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Gorenjska hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Radovljica
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Radovljica, Gorenjska, Slovenia.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Gorenjska.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, help the 430 believers in Gorenjska to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gorenjska, Slovenia has a population of 206,700.

We estimate Gorenjska has 430 people who might know Jesus, 111,316 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 94,954 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 480 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Gorenjska, Slovenia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
